description.value: You specialize in blending into a particular type of environment, able to disappear after taking your shot. Choose either natural or urban terrain. In the chosen terrain, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Hide]{Hide} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Sneak]{Sneak} even without cover or being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed}.
